title.quote:

highlights.1: We will bring advanced technology and highest effectiveness.
highlights.2: We are a company with good quality in all aspects.
highlights.3: We will develop capacity at all times.

about.description:
Building Advanced Solution Company Limited, Called “BAS” was founded on September 21, 2011 with registered capital of 15 million baht, With that goal. We are a company with the best quality and service in the distribution and installation of equipment in engineering.

BAS is the official distributor of many different groups together. We focus on all products. And have a team that specializes in a particular category as well. And most importantly, we have spare parts that are reserved for customers with a value of more than 5 million baht all the time

service.title: Our Services
service.description: Our services encompass applications in buildings and various areas, covering security, energy management, and user convenience within the building.

project.title: Featured Project
project.specializes: Our team, certified by Johnson Controls, specializes in advanced building automation, HVAC systems, and energy efficiency solutions. We deliver high-quality, innovative projects that meet industry standards and exceed client expectations. From smart buildings to energy-saving solutions, trust us to provide sustainable, efficient, and cutting-edge solutions for your needs.

contact.title: The leader in security system installation
